ing: 2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers gin (such as AviationÂ® or Hendrick'sÂ®)
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers orange-flavored liqueur (such as CointreauÂ®)
2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers elderflower liqueur (such as St. GermainÂ®)
ins: Combine gin, orange-flavored liqueur, elderflower liqueur, and lemon juice with some crushed ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until the outside of shaker has frosted. Strain into 2 glasses.
